verses.name: Exodus 35:26
verses.text: And all the women whose heart stirred them up in wisdom spun goats’ hair.

verses.name: Exodus 35:27
verses.text: And the rulers brought onyx stones, and stones to be set, for the ephod, and for the breastplate;

verses.name: Exodus 35:28
verses.text: And spice, and oil for the light, and for the anointing oil, and for the sweet incense.

verses.name: Exodus 35:29
verses.text: The children of Israel brought a willing offering unto the Lord, every man and woman, whose heart made them willing to bring for all manner of work, which the Lord had commanded to be made by the hand of Moses.
